tasks.title: Brain Graph (N4): Core module skeleton + endpoints plan
tasks.prompt: Design a privacy-first, bounded Brain Graph module for copilot_core. Deliver: data model (nodes/edges), decay + top-K pruning rules, and concrete endpoint contracts (/api/v1/graph/state, /api/v1/graph/snapshot.svg). Output as a concise spec + TODO list in markdown.

tasks.title: Forwarder: event schema + minimal attributes
tasks.prompt: Review the HA->Core forwarded event payload schema. Propose a minimal stable envelope + attribute conventions (zone_ids, old/new state) and redaction policy. Output: recommendations + example payloads.

tasks.title: Habitus roles taxonomy
tasks.prompt: Refine the Habitus zone roles taxonomy (motion/lights/brightness/heating/humidity/co2/door/window/lock/cover/media/noise/pressure/etc). Define purpose, typical entity domains, and how each should be visualized and mined. Output: a table-like bullet spec.

tasks.title: PilotSuite UX: alpha layout
tasks.prompt: Propose a PilotSuite dashboard IA (tabs/views) that supports operators: status, dev surface, habitus zones, media, history/events, versions/changelog links. Keep governance-first (generate YAML only). Output: recommended views + key cards.

tasks.title: Core candidates store contract
tasks.prompt: Define a stable candidate object for suggestions (id, kind, label, evidence, support/confidence/lift, defer_until). Map to HA repairs UX. Output: JSON schema + lifecycle rules.

tasks.title: Habitus miner A→B rules (first pass)
tasks.prompt: Design the first habit miner: detect A→B patterns from events with a Δt window, debounce, support/confidence/lift. Output: algorithm outline + parameters + safety constraints.

tasks.title: Mood module v0: signals and scoring
tasks.prompt: Propose a minimal mood scoring stub using only local signals (media context, lights, motion). Output: mood vector dimensions, scoring approach, and HA sensors.

tasks.title: SystemHealth module outline
tasks.prompt: Outline a SystemHealth module: detect slow recorder, oversized attributes, integration failures; feed into Repairs suggestions. Output: checks + evidence + governance UX.

tasks.title: UniFi module outline
tasks.prompt: Outline a UniFi module: WAN loss/jitter, client roams, baselines. Focus on local-only data + suggestions UX. Output: checks + evidence.

tasks.title: Energy module outline
tasks.prompt: Outline an Energy module: anomaly detection, load shifting suggestions, explainability. Output: candidate types + minimal inputs.

tasks.title: Dev surface playbook
